isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - AIR CONDITIONING BASIC THEORY, SYSTEM DIAGNOSIS AND SERVICE (WITH R-12 REFRIGERANT SYSTEM) - SPECIAL SERVICE TOOLS - AIR CONDITIONER CHARGING STATIONS

svcproc.title: AIR CONDITIONER CHARGING STATIONS
svcproc.para: The OEM-1387 for R-12 or OEM-1416 for HFC-134A is a heavy-duty evacuation and charging station with large capacity components ( Figure 22). Included are a 5-CFM, rotary vane vacuum pump; a ten-pound, heated Dial-A-Charge charging cylinder; and a professional quality manifold gauge set with 96" hoses with "Quick-Seal" couplings for R-12 systems and metric SAE quick-disconnect fittings (with valves) for HFC-134A systems.
